Name: Draw It!
About the game: Draw it! With the help of drawing and physics - help the smiley to get to the platform. Draw a smiley path using geometric shapes to get to the platform! Use your imagination to achieve the goal! You have a huge number of options! Draw and reach the goal! ✒ 70 levels! ✒ many achievements! ✒ low system requirements! ✒ creativity! ✒ Drawing! ✒ Intuitive gameplay! ✒ Realistic 2d physics! ✒ funny music! ✒ very low price!
